mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_sales(name, price, custid, custname, progress, lasttime, userid, username) VALUES(#{name},#{price},#{custid},#{custname},#{progress},#{lasttime},#{userid},#{username});
mapper.update: UPDATE t_sales SET lasttime = #{lasttime},successtime=#{successtime},progress=#{progress} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_sales WHERE DATE(successtime) >= #{start} and DATE(successtime) <=#{end} and progress = #{state}
SELECT ifnull(SUM(price),0) FROM t_sales WHERE DATE(successtime) >= #{start} and DATE(successtime) <=#{end} and progress = #{state}

SELECT temp.custtype AS `name`,(SELECT count(*) FROM t_sales WHERE t_sales.progress=temp.custtype and date(createtime) >= #{start} and date(createtime) <= #{end}) AS `value` FROM (SELECT "初次接触" AS `custtype` UNION SELECT "确认意向" UNION SELECT "提供合同" UNION SELECT "交易完成" UNION SELECT "交易搁置") as `temp`
